channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- ADAudit Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- ADAudit Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-21791|2024-05-22T18:05:23.307Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL Injection in lockout history option. Note: Non-admin users cannot exploit this vulnerability.
